item.title: How to Enable Ultimate Performance Mode in Windows 10
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: The Windows 10 April update brought a lot of new features. One of the little-known features is a new power plan called ultimate performance mode. According to Microsoft, this mode decreases the micro-latency between the OS and the hardware. Exactly what that means, I’m not too sure. However, this mode is more than just made up fluff. I ran a couple of benchmarks between using the default balanced mode on my PC and the ultimate performance mode.
